trans-unit.source: Indicates to a COM client that all classes in the current version of an assembly are compatible with classes in an earlier version of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前版本的組件中的所有類別都都會與舊版本的組件中的類別相容的 COM 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this attribute to assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此屬性套用至組件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) uses an assembly's version number to calculate class identifiers (CLSIDs).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， [Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)計算類別識別項 (Clsid) 會使用組件的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: All public, COM-visible classes receive new CLSIDs each time you export a new assembly version.
trans-unit.target: 所有公開的 COM 可見的類別到新的 Clsid 每次收到匯出新的組件版本。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the `ComCompatibleVersionAttribute` attribute to force all CLSIDs for classes in the current version of an assembly to be the same as CLSIDs for classes in an earlier version of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以套用`ComCompatibleVersionAttribute`屬性，強制所有在目前版本中的組件會與舊版本的組件中類別的 Clsid 相同類別的 Clsid。

trans-unit.source: As long as the CLSIDs remain the same, a legacy COM application can use the later version of a compatible assembly after you uninstall the original assembly.
trans-unit.target: 只要 Clsid 維持不變，傳統的 COM 應用程式可以使用相容的組件的較新版本之後解除安裝原始的組件。

trans-unit.source: If you apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> to a class to explicitly set its CLSID, the `ComCompatibleVersionAttribute` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果您套用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>至類別，以便明確地設定其 CLSID、`ComCompatibleVersionAttribute`沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this attribute combine to form the four parts of an assembly version.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的屬性組合的組件版本的表單四個部分。

trans-unit.source: Always specify the lowest version that the current assembly is backward compatible with so that version is used to calculate all CLSIDs in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 一定要指定的最低版本，目前組件是與舊版相容，因此該版本用來計算組件中所有的 Clsid。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComCompatibleVersionAttribute"></xref> class with the major version, minor version, build, and revision numbers of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComCompatibleVersionAttribute"></xref>主要版本、 次要版本、 組建與修訂編號的組件的類別。

trans-unit.source: The major version number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的主要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The minor version number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的次要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The build number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的組建編號。

trans-unit.source: The revision number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的修訂編號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the build number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得該組件的組建編號。

trans-unit.source: The build number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的組建編號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the major version number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得組件的主要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The major version number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的主要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minor version number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得組件的次要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The minor version number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的次要版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the revision number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得該組件的修訂編號。

trans-unit.source: The revision number of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的修訂編號。
